text: International Downtown Association (IDA) is an international organization dedicated to Downtowns and city centers around the world. The organization is located in Washington D.C., United States and was established in 2011. IDA is a world leader and champion for vital and livable urban centers. Through its network of diverse practitioners, its rich body of knowledge, and its unique capacity to nurture community-building partnerships, IDA provides tools, intelligence and strategies for creating healthy and dynamic centers that anchor the well-being of towns, cities and regions of the world. == Other websites == * International Downtown Association Category:Urban planning organizations Category:1954 establishments in the United States Category:International organizations Category:Organizations in Washington, D.C.
title: International Downtown Association
